original_title: Einleitung zu Arnold Schoenbergs Begleitmusik zu einer Lichtspielscene
overview: This is a small, intense film based on Schoenberg’s opus of the same name with the subtitle “danger, fear, catastrophe”. It deals with emerging fascism and the persecution of Jews, as well as with their historical continuities.
title: Introduction to Arnold Schoenberg’s Accompaniment to a Cinematic Scene
